dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create Sample Data for DataSet
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload:
%dw 1.0 %output application/java %var sampleSize = 1000 ---
(1 to sampleSize) map { "Field1" : "Field1Value" ++ "$", "Field2" : "Field2Value" ++ "$", "Field3" : now as :date, //Date formatting will be taken care by Connector using MetaData JSON "Field4" : "Field4Value" ++ "$", "Field5" : "Field5Value" ++ "$" }
